metadata.title: CVE-2021-21783 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the WS-Addressing plugin functionality of Genivia gSOAP 2.8.107. A specially crafted SOAP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gsoap package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
